# [Jury Selection](https://widmana.github.io/RPortfolio/JurySelection.html) 

2021 | 8 | 01 Last compiled: `r Sys.Date()`

The Jury Selection project created a linear regression model using juror racial data from the 6 trials of Curtis Flowers to determine whether there were racial disparities in the way that lawyers use peremptory strikes.

# [Election Data](https://widmana.github.io/RPortfolio/ElectionData.html) 

2018 | 7 | 23 Last compiled: `r Sys.Date()`

The Election Data project created a linear regression model using voting data from 67 Florida counties to determine whether there was an anomaly in the disputed 2000 Presidential Election primary Democratic ballot (Buchanan vs. Gore) in Palm Beach County, synthesized in a seven-page written report.
